ygData.subject: Bard website, etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello there. New to the list, and new to a bard!  Have a 7th (almost 8th) level bard on Tunare, and am enjoying it immensely.  I m doing mail runs just for the
ygData.messageBody:
Hello there.

New to the list, and new to a bard! Have a 7th (almost 8th) level bard on
Tunare, and am enjoying it immensely. I'm doing mail runs just for the fun
of it, and have set up hotkeys.. "Mail delivery! Coming through! Make way!"
heh.

Was wondering of there are any bard specific websites out there? Also, are
there any magical bard-only items to look forward to as I enter my
double-digit levels soon? I imagine there's stuff on the Plane of Fear, and
other planes, but I'd like some nice intruments (drums that give a big boost
to Selo's speed, a "singing shield" that enhances your combat songs, maybe?)
to get from questing, since I plan on doing a lot of that with this
character.

Anywho, ttyl
Gaelaian, bard of the 7th verse, Tunare.
